body:
^^^

http://prntscr.com/a7zmh4


I think that half of the 9 year olds at my old school (elementary) will ask at least once for a minechest :v
1) Minechest openings from famous minecraft youtubers
2) Wants to look cool in front of other friends

EDIT: Realizes they are only sold in America
So what do you think?

title: Whats your opinion on "Minechests"?

replies.body: I think it's really nerdy IMO. I'm sorry but I just cringe at kids who wear minecraft shirts and have the "cool" gear. It's good for the gamers I guess, also maybe younger kids
replies.body_tagged: I think it's really nerdy IMO. I'm sorry but I just cringe at kids who wear minecraft shirts and have the "cool" gear. It's good for the gamers I guess, also maybe younger kids

replies.body: It's cool, but I will probably never get it.

replies.body: A copy of every other subscription based box thing. There's too many
